#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int num,r,t;
    while(scanf("%d",&num)>0)
    {
    t=num;
    while(t>0)
    {
        r=t%10;
        if(r!=0 && num%r!=0)
        {
             printf("Invalid\n");
            break;
        }
        t=t/10;
        if(t==0)
            printf("Valid\n");
    }
}
return 0;
}
